name: Reflections Overpowered
description:
Controls

Mouse and keyboard for now. 

[Escape] to quit at any time (I think).

Click or press [s] to scroll through text. Otherwise controls introduced through gameplay.

Game Status and Warnings

Game might be a little GPU heavy. Sorry about that.

Status: 

Level 1: Done.

Level 2: 40% complete (may not be included in build)

Levels 3 -6: Not happening any time soon.

Summary

You play as a girl named Kawena, a prodigy fighter brought into the highest ranks of the military at a very young age. Her weapon of choice is a massive blade that is able to generate a reflective force-field when swung. However, as she mastered her skills in combat, she lost grip of other values in life, and soon become bored with life and behaved almost robotic-like. But someone came to help.

This was created in 48 hours, and unfortunately I didn't have time to make the rest of the levels. You can find a preview of what was to come in level 2 if you beat level 1! But essentially every level would feature a graphics update and new character abilities.

Enjoy!

Representing one of the graduates in the GCO grads vs undergrads competition. Developed solo (other than music).
